QuestData.Title: A Brother Betrayed
QuestData.Description: My village was able to escape the naga onslaught at first. We would have all made it to Nagrand had it not been for my brother. He sold our souls for his own freedom.$B$BNow he works here as a slave driver, whipping his own brothers until their backs bleed. Make Mennu pay, $r.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Mennu the Betrayer, then return to Nahuud.
QuestData.RewardText: Mennu's death will not fix the broken backs of my family and friends, but it will give them a chance to live the rest of their lives free.
